# UICellConfigurationState.DragState.lifting

**Case**

A user interaction is lifting the cell, but it isn’t yet part of an active drag session.

## Declaration

```swift
case lifting
```

## Drag states

- **UICellConfigurationState.DragState.none**: The system hasn’t associated the cell with a drag session.
- **UICellConfigurationState.DragState.dragging**: The cell is part of an active drag session.

items.description: The system hasn’t associated the cell with a drag session.
